returns._0: weight Voting weight based on expertise score

params.wouldBeCorrect: Whether the hypothetical answer would be correct

returns._0: projectedScore Projected score after the attempt

batchRecalculateScores(address,uint32[]).notice: Batch recalculate scores for a user across multiple topics

calculateExpertiseScore(address,uint32).notice: Calculate expertise score for a user in a topic

calculateTimeDecay(uint64).notice: Calculate time decay factor based on last activity

calculateVolumeBonus(uint32).notice: Calculate volume bonus based on total challenges

getVotingWeight(address,uint32).notice: Get voting weight for a user in a topic (used by Poll contract)

previewScoreChange(address,uint32,bool).notice: Preview what score a user would have with an additional correct/incorrect answer

processChallengeAttempt(address,uint64).notice: Process challenge attempt and update user score

recalculateScore(address,uint32).notice: Recalculate score for a user in a topic (can be called by anyone for transparency)
